completions.nl_description: Recolor all the open cells inside or adjacent to an object of color X with color A, C, or F.
Recolor objects adjacent to 'X' objects to colors as observed in the examples: those in the middle colored to 'C', those on the left of the middle to 'F', and those on the right of the middle to 'A'.
Recolor all 3x3 blocks to color C, F, and A, depending on their unique identifier.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of objects of color X to a specific color.
Recolor all objects neighboring and different from X to color C, F, or A.
Fill the inner area of objects of size 7 with color C, inner area of objects of size 4 with color A, and the inner area of objects of size 1 with color F without overlapping.
Recolor objects adjacent to X to color their pairs of 3 as C, then the next pair adjacent to C as A.
Recolor the objects of size 3 that are neighbors of an object of color X to color C, and the objects of size 2 that are neighbors of an object of color X to color A.
Recolor all objects of size 1 to color F, objects of size 4 to color A, and objects of size 6 to color C.
Color the interior of hollow squares of color X with the same character as adjacent objects.
Extend all the other objects of size 1 and color different than X toward the purple objects, without overlapping.
Fill hollow objects surrounded by color X with new colors in the holes.
Recolor objects that are completely inside the biggest object.
Recolor all objects that are enclosed by objects of color X or neighbor to said objects. Objects recolor differently based on the pair.
Recolor all objects next to the X objects with colors C, F and A.
Recolor all objects inside the existing squares to distinguish regions.
Recolor all objects connected to X in color C and F to color A.
Recolor all objects of size 1 to color C and all objects of size 2 to color A.
Recolor all non-X objects that are neighbors to an X object to match the color of the X object they are next to.
Recolor objects which are neighbors to an object of color X. Use color C for the first object and color A for the second object.
Recolor all objects of size 3 to color A and all objects of size 4 to color C.
Recolor
Recolor objects of size 3 to color C and of size 2 to color A.
Fill the inner pixels of all hollow rectangles with color C if they are neighbors of the object of color X.
Recolor all objects adjacent to the grey objects in the grid.
Recolor all objects adjacent to X with a different color, and fill the interiors of X's neighbors with another color.
Fill objects inside the larger object with specific colors.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of objects of color X.
Recolor all objects neighboring objects of color X to different colors.
Color the interior pixels of each object of color X with other colors
Recolor all objects of color different than X, that are neighbors of color X objects.
Recolor the enclosed objects adjacent to X cells in the grids. Replace color O with C and F, and replace color O with A and C based on the blocks.
Recolor all objects internal to objects of color X.
Fill all objects of color different than X, which are inside the hollow rectangle, with the color C and A respectively.
Extend objects of color O and size 1 towards the nearby cyan objects
Recolor the objects adjacent to and outside of the X-shaped objects.
Recolor the bottom-left neighbors of X objects to color C for size 1, F for size 2, and A for size 3.
Recolor objects neighboring X to C.
Recolor all objects within X to either color C or color A or color F.
Recolor the objects that are neighbors of objects with color X.
Recolor the cells adjacent to objects of color X to specific colors.

Recolor all objects that are neighbors of the object of color X if their color is different from X, such that object color becomes C for all non-X objects in the same row with X, and color becomes A for all non-X objects in the same column with X.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of objects of color X while preserving those positions to C if they were neighbors or A otherwise.
Recolor all enclosed grey objects to specified colors
Recolor objects that are adjacent to color X to colors C, A, and F based on their positions.
Change the color of objects neighboring color X from Y to Z.
Update objects of size 1 to color F, objects of size 2 to color A, and objects of size 3 to color C.
Recolor the neighbors of an object with color X to different colors based on their positions.
Recolor all objects adjacent to the color X to either C, A, or F.
Extend all objects of size 1 toward neighboring objects of color X, without overlapping, then recolor neighbors to color C or A based on their position.
Recolor neighboring objects to X based on their proximity and current color.
Recolor to color C all objects of color O that are neighbors of objects of color X and of size 1, and recolor to color A all the other objects of color O that are neighbors of objects of color X.
Recolor the objects neighboring object of color X to different colors.
Recolor all neighboring objects to X with color C or A based on their original color. Objects initially colored O should be recolored to A while objects initially colored O should be recolored to C.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of objects of color X.
Transform all objects of size 1 that are neighbors of an object with color X by extending toward the object of color X, then recolor to a new color.
Recolor the objects that are adjacent to color X to a new color.
Recolor the internal pixels of all objects of color X to color C, and the border pixels of those objects to color A.
Recolor all objects enclosed by objects of color X.
Change the color of all objects that are neighbors to the color X and are not of color X themselves.
Recolor the interior of hollow shapes to color A and the sides of hollow shapes to color C, for the hollow shapes that have color X
Extend objects adjacent to objects of color X, recoloring them based on the neighbor pairs.
Recolor objects that are entirely surrounded by X, using a different color for each object.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors to the X objects.
Recolor all objects adjacent to the object X with different colors.
Color objects neighboring X to colors corresponding to their distance from X, using colors C, A, and F.
Color the objects inside the objects of color X differently.
Move all objects neighboring another object of color X toward them and recolor them to color C, A, or F based on their initial position.
Recolor all objects neighboring objects of color X to their respective colors.
Extend all objects that are neighbors of a color X object to cover them.
Recolor all objects of color O and which are neighbors of objects of color X to C, except when they are initially at the same row. If they are at the same row, recolor them to A.
Recolor the regions inside objects of color X to different colors.
Recolor the neighbors of the object with color X in different colors (C, A, F) based on their position.
Recolor cells that are neighbors of X cells, avoid overlapping objects.
Recolor all X objects completely enclosed in other objects.
Recolor neighboring cells of color X to different colors based on a pattern.
Recolor objects that are neighbors of objects in the X color.
Change the color of neighboring objects to X to C if they are in the top half and A if they are in the bottom half.
Recolor all the enclosed objects by filling them with C or A, based on their position.
Recolor all objects adjacent to objects of color X, ensuring the adjacent objects get colors based on their positions: C, F, and A respectively.
Extend all objects that are neighbors towards the color X without overlapping. Then, recolor the affected objects based on a specific pattern (A, C, or F).
Recolor objects that border the objects of color X toward them.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of an object colored 'X' to either 'C', 'A', or 'F', respectively.
Recolor the interior of the hollow squares of color X with different specific colors.
Fill all objects neighbored by objects of color X toward those neighbor objects, without overlapping.
Recolor all objects of size 2 to color A, recolor all objects of size 3 to color C, and recolor all objects of size 1 to color F.
Extend objects of size 1 to create a row and column of 'C' or 'A', depending on the row or column they are in, without overlapping.
Recolor all the objects enclosed in an object of color X to specific colors C, A, and F based on their positions in the grid.
Recolor the interior cells of objects formed by the letter 'X' with different colors.
Recolor the interior of all hollow rectangles to color A, and then recolor all objects touching the color X to color C.
Recolor the internal blocks of the squares of color X to colors C, A, and F.
Recolor objects enclosed within white objects to color 'C' and 'A' depending on their original position.
Recolor objects not containing X either as neighbors or lower rows.
Recolor all interior pixels of objects of color X either to C, F, or A based on specific clear patterns
Recolor the neighbors of all objects colored X to C and A and F based on adjacency.
Recolor neighbors of the X objects to color C, F, or A based on their positions in the grid.
Recolor objects enclosed by color X to C if they are at the top, A if they are at the middle, and F if they are at the bottom.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors to the color X.
Update the color of objects that are adjacent to objects of color X. Each new color is unique for each pair of adjacent objects.
Recolor the objects centered inside objects of color X in the top half of the grid.
Recolor all objects enclosed by objects of color X. The recoloring uses different colors: C for the central portions and A for the corners.
Recolor the objects at the positions surrounded by objects of color X.
Convert all enclosed regions to color C, regions adjacent to it to color A, and the objects with color F
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of object X to color C, other neighbors to color A, and any remaining neighbors to color F.
Recolor all objects that are neighbors of objects of color X. The new color should be different for each neighboring object, according to their initial color.
Recolor the objects at the edges connected to the left side to C, the ones connected to the right side to A, and the ones connected to the top to F.
Recolor all inner objects inside the objects of color X.
